posts.post_content:
Both were in a homemade album and have slight paper loss on the fronts.  Backs are exceptional and the cards are very eye appealing.  Price includes shipping & insurance.  No additional charge for Paypal.  Email for scans (ppgustafson@yahoo.com):

Roger Bresnahan (HOF) - (Sold)
Rube Manning - (Sold)

Would also consider trading for T206 (VG condition) that I need.
